Class GameMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameMap

  • public class GameMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a game map.

    Yujin, Luke, Steele, Michael

      • shortestPath

        public java.util.ArrayList<Coord> shortestPath(Coord from,
                                      Coord to,
                                      Entity reference,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<Entity> ignore)
        Finds the shortest path from "from" to "to". The path will exclude "from".
        Parameters:
        from - The starting coordinate
        to - The ending coordinate
        reference - The entity we're testing for collisions
        ignore - List of entities to ignore when colliding. Include, for example, the enemy which is trying to find the path, into this list. null ignores no items.
        Returns:
        A list of coordinates in order, representing the shortest path. If there is no path, returns null.

      • canEnter

        public boolean canEnter(Coord check,
               Entity reference)
        Check if a square can be entered
        Parameters:
        check - The coordinate to check
        reference - Entities to ignore when cehcking
        Returns:
        True if it can enter, otherwise false

        Parameters:

        reference - The entity trying to enter
        ignore - Entities to ignore when checking
